title: Santa Monica
name: View Decks at Santa Monica Airport (KSMO)
directions: On the north and south sides of the Administration Building
content: Open air-decks with picnic tables. Watch and photograph the airplanes as they come and go at the airport. Listen to Air Traffic Control on loudspeakers. Bring a picnic lunch. Also, Clover Park, at the corner of 25th Street and Ocean Park Boulevard, has a viewing area with a telescope focused on the runway.
